about_the_game:
[Introduction]：

  • A space explorer with a dream of living freely has been pursuing infinite energy. Just as he is about to complete the construction of a Dyson Sphere, he is suddenly attacked by a more advanced civilization, losing everything and forced to flee. He makes an emergency landing on an unknown planet.

  • Alone and with limited resources, he must start from scratch, searching for supplies, rebuilding his life, and rekindling his dream of freedom!

  • During his journey, he encounters one of twelve trapped Star Sprites, who seeks help and hopes that her sisters can also be rescued.

  • Accept this mission and delve deep into the secrets of this mysterious planet.

  • You will traverse various regions, experience exotic cultures, make friends, face challenges, and ultimately save all the Star Sprites, absorbing their energy to repair your ship.

  • Afterward, you can continue to take on more challenges in the vast universe. Completing the story doesn't necessarily mean the game is over~

[Team Composition] :

You can form a squad of up to four members at a time, using their skills and switching team members to achieve optimal combat coordination.

[Combat System] :

[1]  Action-Packed Combat

★ For a thrilling experience, dive right into the action!

This game offers the fast-paced excitement of an arcade beat-'em-up. Grab enemies and throw them around—cars, boxes, bottles, anything goes! Don’t hold back; you can even toss enemies off cliffs, into water, or into factory gears for satisfying environmental kills.

Collect energy by attacking enemies, and when your energy bar is full, unleash powerful ultimate moves for a satisfying monster-slaying experience. Hahahaha...

[2]  Stealth Infiltration

★ For a more strategic experience, choose to play stealthily.

If you aim for perfect combat outcomes, you can opt for a stealth approach. Knock out enemies and cleverly hide their bodies to earn more rewards. This requires careful planning and strategic thinking.

★ Epic Boss Battles, Worth Every Moment!

Each boss has unique characteristics. Experience their power and defeat them to feel a great sense of accomplishment!

▶ Equipment and Item Crafting :

The game features a rich equipment system where items are obtained through synthesis. All materials come from battles, and the success rate for synthesis is 100%. There is no durability system for equipment!

♥ Summary

This game combines action-packed combat, stealth infiltration, and epic boss battles, all set against the backdrop of a mysterious and diverse alien world. With a compelling storyline and endless challenges, it offers players a deeply immersive and rewarding experience. Whether you prefer intense action or strategic stealth, there's something for everyone in this expansive universe.
